About Me

Lets talk about me...

Bio

As I tend to the wounds from the burn marks of a non-creative corporate career, I feel I can no longer live a double life. My passion for design and coding has taken a back seat to a career that I enjoy; but it is a career that I don't love anymore. It's time for me to get back to that feeling of pure creativity and passion!

The conscious effort of this portfolio site will for you (the reader, supporter and potential cleint) to follow along in my journey back to design, coding and whatever else I feel thats next for me!

As I dig deep into brushing off the dust of things I have learned in the past, I am also challenged to add new technologies that will make me a more modern developer. In the past I have done remote work for a few agencies, been part of some small startups, and designed and created digital products for the small business owners in my area. My main goal for any cleint is to invoke a great user interface in my designs and gain an emotional user experience in the process. So lets get to it!!
